AVSEC Order  No. 7/2011 
Subject:- 
Pre-flight anti-sabotage checks 
 
In continuation of this  Bureau Circular  No. 26/2006 dated 4.12.2006  and in 
exercise of powers conferred by Section 5A of the Aircraft Act 1934, delegated to him 
vide Government of India, Ministry of Civil Aviation Notification No. 1797 dated July 3, 
1997, Commissioner of Security(Civil Aviation), Bureau of Civil Aviation Security for  the 
purpose of  securing aircraft operations directs that while conducting pre-flight checks of 
the aircraft,  the  aircraft operators operating to / from India shall ensure that passengers 
disembarking from  the aircraft at any time do not leave items on board the aircraft. 
 
2. 
This AVSEC Order shall  be implemented  with immediate effect. Any 
violation  of this  AVSEC Order shall attract penalty under  section 11 A of the  Aircraft 
Act, 1934. 
 
 
 
 
 (Gurjot Singh Malhi, IPS)
